headline: Simon Property Group Sells $1.5 Billion of Senior Notes
summary: Simon®, a real estate investment trust engaged in the ownership of premier shopping, dining, entertainment and mixed-use destinations, announced today that its majority-owned operating partnership subsidiary, Simon Property Group, L.P. (the "Operating Partnership"), has agreed to sell:

headline: Macerich Q2 FFO Misses Estimates, Occupancy Declines Y/Y
summary: MAC's second-quarter FFO fell short of estimates on lower occupancy and higher expenses, but leasing activities and revenue growth offer bright spots.
